title: HOUR 1 - Belichick-Brady, Cowboys, Patriots
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Belichick-Brady, Cowboys, Patriots
description:
Colin talks about a new book on the drama between Bill Belichick and Tom Brady

Mike McCarthy continues to have clock management issues

Tom Brady was fed up in New England
